item.title: TPG, QIA-Led Group to Privatize Kangji in $1.4 Billion Deal
item.description: A consortium led by TPG Inc. and the Qatar Investment Authority has offered to buy out Hong Kong-listed Kangji Medical Holdings Ltd. in a deal that values the Chinese medical device maker at about HK$

item.title: TPG, QIA-Led Group to Privatize Kangji in $1.4 Billion Deal
item.description: A consortium led by TPG Inc. and the Qatar Investment Authority has offered to buy out Hong Kong-listed Kangji Medical Holdings Ltd. in a deal that values the Chinese medical device maker at about HK$
